name: Professor Rewind
description:
Professor Steve Interface is experimenting with the space-time repherbalizer, a time-warping watch that can teleport its user back to his position a certain period of time ago. Can you help him prove that it's useful?

Apologies if the game looks rushed, because it was!

This game is designed and created for the 4th Brackey's game jam by Charlinquent, ahkh78 & Outlander15.

Contact (Discord): ahkh#0458, Charlinquent#8912
